form.createSession.participantAuth.switc: After your upload of a list of SwitchAAI accounts (exact matches by email), participants will get access to your KlickerUZH session using their personal SwitchAAI login. Therefore, you will not be able to emulate any of your participants.

form.userSettings.string.accountDeletion: To request deletion of your Klicker account, please click the button below. You will be sent an email that will allow you to confirm your account deletion.
